name: agent_generated_gns3_mcp
description: Complete GNS3 (Graphical Network Simulator-3) integration through MCP. Enables AI assistants to create, manage, and simulate network topologies using the GNS3 REST API. Supports project management, network device configuration, topology building, simulation control, and traffic capture for network engineering and education.
description_for_agent: GNS3 MCP server for network topology management and simulation. Provides tools for project management, device configuration, network building, simulation control, and traffic analysis. Connects to GNS3 server to enable programmatic network lab creation and management.

GNS3_SERVER_URL.description: GNS3 server URL (default: http://localhost:3080). Can be overridden per tool call.

GNS3_USERNAME.description: GNS3 server username for authentication (optional - anonymous access supported if not configured).

GNS3_PASSWORD.description: GNS3 server password for authentication (optional - anonymous access supported if not configured).
